main.name: Harrison Kidd
main.description: I am a Full Stack Web Developer using JavaScript and React to develop web pages and applications. Learn more about me and check out some of the cool things I have been working on down below
main.bio: Full Stack Web Developer (MERN Stack), with a natural sciences background. Highly motivated and ambitious problem solver looking to join a forward thinking software development team. Experienced with developing front-end, back-end, and full stack web applications.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to send me a message if you would like to link up or have general comments!

resume.skillmessage: These are some of the primary languages and tools that I have been using lately, with approximate proficiency levels.

education.description: Rigorous 12-week Coding Boot Camp that focused on the MERN stack.
Studied abroad in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia, July 2014 – December 2014, and also was the scholarship chair of Theta Chi Fraternity, August 2013 – December 2013.

work.title: Research Technician II
work.description: Focused on pancreatic islet biology and learning the ins and outs of endocrine and exocrine cells in order to produce publishable data.

work.title: Pharmacy Technician
work.description: Assisted the pharmacist with day-to-day tasks in the pharmacy.

projects.title: Spuds and Duds
projects.description: A Full-Stack (MERN) application that provides users with a social movie review community.

projects.title: Jobster
projects.description: A one stop shop to keep all job app related materials.

projects.title: Pickflix and Grill
projects.description: A movie and recipe generator that takes in input from the user.

projects.title: Note Taker
projects.description: An express.js back end is used to save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.

projects.title: Budget Tracker
projects.description: Added functionality to an existing Budget Tracker application that allows for offline access and functionality.

projects.title: Formula 1 Quiz
projects.description: A timed quiz on random Formula 1 facts that stores the top 3 high scores in local storage.
